title: Get in touch

q1.question: How long does it take to build a static business website?
q1.answer: A static site typically takes 1–3 weeks depending on the complexity, design requirements, and the content provided.

q2.question: Can you redesign my existing website into a static version?
q2.answer: Yes. We can rebuild your existing site as a static website while preserving your brand identity and improving performance.

q3.question: How soon can I see SEO results?
q3.answer: SEO is a long-term strategy. You can expect noticeable improvements within 3–6 months, depending on competition and your website’s current status.

q4.question: Why should I manage my Google Business Page?
q4.answer: An optimized Google Business Profile boosts local visibility, increases trust, and drives more customers to your location or website.

q5.question: What does branding include?
q5.answer: Branding includes your logo, color palette, typography, messaging, and brand guidelines — all designed to create a consistent and professional image.
